hadiths.text: Hilal bin Yasar said:"Ziyad bin Abi Al-Ja'd took me by the hand while we were in Ar Raqqah, he made me stand before a Shaikh who was called Wabisah bin Ma'bad, from Bani Asad. Ziyad said: 'This Shaikh narrated to me that a prayed alone behind the row' - and the Shaikh was listening - 'so Allah's Messenger ordered him to repeat the Salat

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الصَّلاَةِ خَلْفَ الصَّفِّ وَحْدَهُ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Salat Behind The Line Alone
